
```{r}
df <- df %>% # now shift it
  mutate(one_day_past = lag(value,n=1))
```


```{r}
df %>% mutate_at(c("value"), tibble::lst("one_day_future"=lead), n = 1)
```


```{r}
df  %>% mutate(P1Dperformance=(value/one_day_past-1)*100)
```
